meanings.sent1: I will retransmit the message to make sure everyone gets it.
meanings.sent2: The radio station will retransmit the news bulletin at the top of the hour.
meanings.sent3: He decided to retransmit the joke to his friend who missed it the first time.
meanings.sent4: The echoes in the canyon seemed to retransmit the sound endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the student to retransmit the information to the class for clarity.

meanings.sent1: Please retransmit the email to all team members for their reference.
meanings.sent2: The TV network will retransmit the live concert for viewers in different time zones.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to retransmit the owner's words in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse retransmits its signal to guide ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: The satellite will retransmit the data back to Earth for analysis.
